description: This file defines the PatientProvider class, a ChangeNotifier that manages state related to patient profiles, including fetching the current user's profile and listing patients via API calls.

classes.name: PatientProvider
classes.description: A state management class for patient-related data, extending ChangeNotifier to notify UI components of data updates.

methods.name: fetchMyProfile
methods.description: Fetches the current patient's profile and updates internal state.

methods.name: listPatients
methods.description: Retrieves a list of patients with optional filtering, pagination, and search query.

methods.name: fetchMyProfile
methods.description: Fetches the current patient's profile from the API and updates internal state.

methods.name: listPatients
methods.description: Returns a list of patient records, supporting optional search query, limit, and skip parameters.
